Text: I would have checked them out... but self-extracting. Not on my computer. There is more often than not a reason for not letting You check a file for viruses and trojans before extracting.

Well, I hope paranoid dude there is wrong, because I've been wanting some Gurdjieff ever since I read volume one of Beelzebub's Tales and could never find the rest of them in my usual bookstores.  Thanks, hydrogen12 (unless of course Mr_Ecks's suspicions prove well-founded).  Guess I'll find out.

Hope you like it. Although 'Beelzebub's Tales to His Grandson,' Gurdjieff's magnum opus, is a long read, it's worth your time.  His second book, 'Meetings with Remarkable Men,' an autobiographical account, is another favorite.
Wonderful collection, thanks a lot! This is safe download, no trojans, viruses or whatever.

It's not self extracting, you need winrar to extract it.

Also the uploader probably packed it like this so no books would stop being seeded.
